alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 11:34AM AKST until February 16 at 5:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 5 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 5 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will spread from southwest to northeast beginning early Wednesday morning. Ample southerly flow associated with this system will allow for heavy, wet, snow at times. Precipitation is expected to be heaviest in the morning hours and may briefly transition to a rain/snow mix at times on Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
